title: Pheno4D: A spatio-temporal dataset of maize and tomato ... - PLOS
summary: This paper presents a multi-temporal dataset with high-resolution registered point clouds of maize and tomato plants, manually labeled for computer vision tasks, providing approximately 260 million labeled 3D points.
usefulness_reason: Score 80 assigned because the title and summary explicitly mention "spatio-temporal dataset" and "point clouds," which are highly relevant to the query. While not a "point process" in the statistical sense, "point clouds" are a type of point data.
